name: Don't Touch The Blocks
description:
Hi potential players, 

I'll keep this as short as possible, I'm a really newbie developer on unity. I only started learning about everything this quarantine. The game you see here on this page was my creation while following along brackeys game tutorial. It's my first ever game and I'd love for feedback. Thanks. :)

Game Controls:

The forward motion is automatic

Press the D key to move your player to the right

Press the A key to move your player to the left

Brackeys youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYbK_tjZ2OrIZFBvU6CCMiA
